uchicago.src.sim.space
Interface Torus

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbsMulti2DHexagonalTorus, AbsMulti2DTorus, Diffuse2D, Diffuse2DHexagonal, HeatSpace, HexaSpace, Multi2DHexagonalTorus, Multi2DTorus, Object2DHexagonalTorus, Object2DTorus, OrderedMulti2DHexagonalTorus, OrderedMulti2DTorus
public interface Torus

Identity interface that indentifies all implementors as tori. Used by NetworkDisplays to wrap nodes around the 2D display of a torus.
